Action.author: hightall
Action.body: I think muse-ui is like material ui, and can fit to any device, and looks better than bootstrap. If will change current theme, I think it's better that we do it at early stages.

Action.author: baohua
Action.body: Cool, can u help elaborate the advantage of changing to Muse-UI?

Action.author: hightall
Action.body: It imitate material ui, if use other frameworks, e.g. react & angular we can use origin material ui library. Because material ui didn't provide Vue library.

Action.author: baohua
Action.body: Seems material UI can support more types of JS frameworks? Hence would we choose it instead of the muse one?

Action.author: hightall
Action.body: I tried to find the official version of Vue for material ui, but unfortunately did not find it, so find this muse to replace the material ui, and it have the most stars on github.
